data: Don't blink for a minute
Throw your leg over your head
Eat a spoonful of hot sauce
Hug your mailbox
Sing your favorite song to the player on the right in an operatic voice
Draw a face on your hand and talk to it
Let the person standing next to you do your makeup. Don't wash it off for an hour
Brush your teeth in front of everyone
Do 10 perfect push-ups
Walk up to someone on the street and ask “how could you?” with a lot of emotion
Eat a spoonful of mustard
Play something on an imaginary guitar
Tie your shoes together and walk like that for the next 15 minutes
Paint yourself so that it looks like you have chickenpox
Dance the macarena
Spin around yourself 50 times and try to walk a straight line
Eat some food without using your hands
Put on underwear on your head until the end of the game
Stuff as many marshmallows into your mouth as possible
Let the person next to you do your makeup any way they want
Say the alphabet as fast as you can
Touch your nose with your tongue
Speak and act like a robot
Close your eyes for the next 3 rounds
Invite someone to tango
Act like a gorilla and pretend you're picking fluff from your friend's hair
Do the cha-cha(like McQueen) until it's your turn again
After everything you say, add “such are the pies” for the next 15 minutes
Put on clean underwear on your head until the end of the game
Close your eyes whenever someone talks to you
Wrap yourself from head to toe in toilet paper
Go outside and howl at the moon.
Stand absolutely still for one minute
Go to a neighbor for a cup of sugar
Gently blow in the ear of the person on the left
Eat a teaspoon of flour
Speak in poems for the next 5 minutes
Wink at the end of every sentence for the next 10 minutes
Put ice cubes down your shirt
Build a tower taller than you out of everything you see
Sing the Alphabet
Go outside and shout “Expecto Patronum”
Fold a piece of paper with one hand
Speak with your tongue held by your thumb and index finger
Paint your nails with markers
Pretend to be a T-Rex
Juggle eggs
Use a hairbrush as a microphone and sing your favorite song
Bite a lemon
Hold a cup of water above your head and jump without spilling it
Balance a spoon on your nose for 10 seconds
Run with your hands tied behind your back
Make a disco
Imitate your favorite cartoon character
Do 20 jumps
Sing like a rap artist
Wrap yourself as a birthday gift
Draw yourself on paper, holding the pencil in your mouth
